```{r}
library(targets)
agenda_date <- tar_read(agenda_df)$hearing_date |> 
  unique() |> 
  format('%B %d, %Y')
n_cases <- tar_read(agenda_df)$case |> 
  unique() |> 
  length()
last_check <- Sys.time() |>
  format('%B %d, %Y %H:%M:%S', tz = "America/New_York")
last_update <- tar_meta(names = "agenda")$time |> 
  format('%B %d, %Y %H:%M:%S', tz = "America/New_York")
```

Displaying `r n_cases` cases that are on the agenda for the Henrico County Planning Commission meeting on `r agenda_date`.

Last checked for updates: `r last_check`

Last updated: `r last_update`
